content.text: 0) Combine brown sugar, 2/3 cup shortening, water, and 1 teaspoon vanilla in large bowl.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Combine"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "brown sugar"@11:22 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "2/3 cup shortening"@24:42 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "water"@44:49 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "1 teaspoon vanilla"@55:73 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "large bowl"@77:87 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 2) In another bowl, combine flour, cocoa, salt, and baking soda.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "combine"@20:27 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "flour"@28:33 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "cocoa"@35:40 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "salt"@42:46 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "baking soda"@52:63 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "another bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Mix this mixture into creamed mixture until just blended.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Mix"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( "this mixture"@7:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "creamed mixture"@25:40 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-3-0 "until just blended"@41:59 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Drop rounded tablespoonfuls of dough onto ungreased baking sheet about 2 inches apart.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Drop"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( "rounded tablespoonfuls of dough"@8:39 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-5-0 "ungreased baking sheet"@45:67 / TOOL )
		:todo ( "about 2 inches apart"@68:88 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Place cookie sheet in the middle of the oven.
7) Cool for 2 minutes on baking sheet.
8) Remove cookies to wire rack to cool completely.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Remove"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( "cookies"@10:17 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-8-0 "wire rack"@21:30 / TOOL )
		:prp ( purp-8-0 "to cool completely"@31:49 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 9) To Make Frosting: Begin by combining evaporated milk, white sugar, 1/4 cup shortening, and egg yolks in medium saucepan.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "combining"@30:39 / AC
		:subtask ( ac-9-1 "To Make Frosting"@-1:-1 / AC )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "evaporated milk"@40:55 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "white sugar"@57:68 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-12 "1/4 cup shortening"@70:88 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-13 "egg yolks"@94:103 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-9-0 "medium saucepan"@107:122 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 10) Stir 1/2 teaspoon vanilla, pecans, and coconut into the warm mixture.
content.eamr:
( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( ac-10-0 "Stir"@4:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-14 "1/2 teaspoon vanilla"@9:29 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-15 "pecans"@31:37 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-16 "coconut"@43:50 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "the warm mixture"@56:72 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 11) Cool completely, and frost cooled cookies.
